original: 吳郡富春人，東吳宗室。孫皓因傷心左夫人王氏之死，長期不臨朝，民間流言孫皓已死，東吳帝位將由孫奉或孫奮繼承。孫皓聽聞流言後，下令處死二人。
text: Wu Jun Fuchun, Dongwu clan. Sun Hao was not in the court for a long time due to the death of his sad left wife Wang. There are rumors that Sun Hao is dead and that the throne of Dongwu will be inherited by Sun Feng or Sun Fen. After Sun Hao heard the rumors, he ordered the two to be executed.
